casebody.data:
REDDING
v.
REDDING. No. S15A1508. Supreme Court of Georgia. Oct. 19, 2015. Carlton Edward Joyce, Bouhan, Williams & Levy, Lucas Drayton Bradley, Bouhan Falligrant LLP, Savannah, for appellant. Kenneth Paul Johnson, Robert Scot Kraeuter, Johnson, Kraeuter & Dunn, LLC, Savannah, for appellee.

Opinion

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the court below is affirmed without opinion pursuant to Supreme Court Rule 59.

Affirmed without opinion.

All the Justices concur.
